title: Introduction to Advanced Science and Technology
description: An overview of cutting-edge research and methodologies across various domains, taught by a team of multinational instructors.

title: Diversity and culture of other countries
description: Prepares students for working in global teams by exploring cultural preconceptions, communication styles, and sociological frameworks.

title: Physics: Mechanics and Thermodynamics
description: Covers fundamental principles of classical mechanics and the laws of thermodynamics, including temperature, heat, and energy.

title: Physics: Electromagnetism
description: Focuses on electric and magnetic fields, circuits, Maxwell's equations, and the principles of electromagnetic induction.

title: Physics: Optics
description: Explores classical optical phenomena such as reflection, refraction, diffraction, and interference, as well as the quantum properties of photons.

title: Biophotonics
description: Introduces optical biosensing technologies, super-resolution microscopy, and advanced imaging techniques like OCT and Raman imaging.

title: Biophysics
description: Covers fundamental concepts and applications in biosensors, bioelectronics, biomechanics, and neurology.
